title: nAnArenru
sahitya:
nAnArenr-uNaravaitta jnAnasiddhanE


anupallavi

  tAnAga vand-anbu kATTit-taDuttANDa dayAparanE


caraNam    tunbam tunbam vAzhvena sAgat-tuNinda pOdilE tUkki aruLai Ukki enai ALAkkiya dEvan 
anbinAlE inbat-tUyanAga vAzhgirEn anrum inrum enrum ennuL ninru nanru nilavuginra
